item.title: 凯雷为标准航空的首次公开募股或出售挑选摩根大通和摩根士丹利
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is working with JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Morgan Stanley on options for aircraft maintenance services provider StandardAero, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日元交易员认为日本要阻止货币下滑仍需艰苦奋斗
item.description: 货币交易商警告日本政府，鉴于经济力量可能导致日元进一步贬值，日本政府需要反复采取行动来提振陷入困境的日元。【原文：Currency traders warned Japan’s government that it will need to repeatedly act to buoy the beleaguered yen given economic forces likely merit further depreciation.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称通胀前景面临 "重大风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲中央银行在实现其通胀目标方面面临着巨大的危险，他列举了一些可能使价格向两个方向过度波动的因素。【原文：The European Central Bank faces significant dangers to achieving its inflation goal, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos, who cited factors that could pull prices too far in either direction.】

item.title: BlueBay 称有关日元干预的交易传言 "风险很大
item.description: 在日元剧烈波动和货币干预言论甚嚣尘上之际，加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）并没有对日元抱有任何侥幸心理。【原文：RBC BlueBay Asset Management isn’t taking any chances on the Japanese yen amid its wild gyrations and talk of currency intervention.】

item.title: 芬兰燃料制造商耐斯特开始物色首席执行官，雷姆斯将离职
item.description: 芬兰可再生柴油生产商耐斯特公司（Neste Oyj）将开始物色新的首席执行官，因为马蒂-莱穆斯（Matti Lehmus）在担任该职务仅两年后就卸任了。【原文：Neste Oyj, the Finnish maker of renewable diesel, will begin a search for a new chief executive officer as Matti Lehmus steps down after just two years in the role.】

item.title: 特鲁多削减外国留学生工作时间以缩减项目规模
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府将把外国留学生每周可在校外工作的时间减少到 24 小时，这也是政府遏制该项目爆炸式增长的努力之一。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government will cut the amount of time foreign students can work off campus to 24 hours per week, part of its effort to curb the explosive growth of the program.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利最糟糕的墨西哥情景：比索下跌 11
item.description: 摩根士丹利认为，如果墨西哥下届政府和国会通过一项破坏体制的非正统议程，"超级比索 "可能会大幅下跌。【原文：The “super peso” could fall sharply if Mexico’s next government and congress adopt an unorthodox agenda that undermines institutions, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 嘉能可顶级股东赞成保留煤炭而非分拆上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Glencore Plc 的几位最大股东认为，该公司应保留其煤炭资产，这使得拟议中的分拆上市成为疑问。【原文：Several of Glencore Plc’s largest shareholders believe that the company should retain its coal assets, according to people familiar with the matter, throwing a proposed spinoff into doubt.】

item.title: 阿根廷大豆压榨机罢工正值收获季节
item.description: 阿根廷大豆加工厂的工人在农民收割庄稼时举行了罢工。【原文：Workers in Argentine soy-processing plants have gone on strike just as farmers are collecting the crop.】

item.title: 资深交易员迈斯纳一年后退出特洛特精品店
item.description: 据知情人士透露，资深投资银行家克里斯蒂安-迈斯纳（Christian Meissner）在加入由高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Veteran investment banker Christian Meissner is leaving BDT & MSD Partners about a year after joining the advisory and private equity firm run by two former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. bankers, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 迈阿密办公大楼以超过 5 亿美元的价格出售
item.description: Nuveen Real Estate 正在寻求出售位于迈阿密布里克尔中心地带的一栋办公楼，该办公楼的租户包括美国银行和阿波罗全球管理公司。【原文：Nuveen Real Estate is seeking to sell a Miami office building located in the heart of the Brickell neighborhood with tenants including Bank of America Corp. and Apollo Global Management Inc.】

item.title: 结告诉《日经新闻》，欧洲央行在可能于 6 月降息后必须保持谨慎
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，欧洲央行在 6 月份可能首次降息后应谨慎行事，季度工资数据可能是决定进一步举措的关键。【原文：The European Central Bank should proceed with caution after a probable first reduction in interest rates in June, with quarterly data on wages likely to be key in determining further moves, according to Governing Council member Klaas Knot.】

item.title: 大选缩减美国首次公开募股窗口，上市活动仍在增加
item.description: 11 月的美国总统大选将对重新苏醒的首次公开募股市场产生影响，从而挤压今年可供公司上市的周数。【原文：The US presidential election in November is set to have an impact on the re-awakening market for initial public offerings, squeezing the number of weeks available this year for companies to go public.】

item.title: 安大略教师退休金计划准备出售石油生产商 Aspenleaf 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安大略省教师退休金计划（Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan）正在洽谈出售其在加拿大油气生产商 Aspenleaf Energy Ltd. 公司的股份。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan is in talks to sell its stake in Canadian oil and gas producer Aspenleaf Energy Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西 Casas Bahia 公司提交庭外债务协议后股价大涨
item.description: 巴西零售商 Grupo Casas Bahia SA 与主要债权人达成庭外协议，重新安排 41 亿雷亚尔（约合 8.01 亿美元）债务的偿还期限，之后该公司股价最高跃升 21%。【原文：Grupo Casas Bahia SA shares jumped as much as 21% after the Brazilian retailer filed an out-of-court deal with its main creditors to reschedule the payment of 4.1 billion reais ($801 million) in debt.】

item.title: 富尔顿计划出售 Republic First 20 亿美元证券
item.description: 富尔顿金融公司（Fulton Financial Corp. ）计划出售 Republic First Bancorp Inc.【原文：Fulton Financial Corp. plans to sell a $2 billion investment securities portfolio held by Republic First Bancorp Inc., the failed lender it acquired late last week after US regulators closed its doors.】

item.title: 中国万科因销售干旱再次出现季度亏损
item.description: 中国万科股份有限公司连续第二个季度出现亏损，这使该开发商在销售下滑和资金紧张的困境中雪上加霜。【原文：China Vanke Co. recorded a second consecutive quarterly loss, adding to the developer’s financial woes as it struggles with slumping sales and a cash crunch.】

item.title: WeWork 达成新的重组协议，创始人诺伊曼遭到唾弃
item.description: WeWork 公司及其主要财务支持者（包括软银集团公司）已达成一项新的重组协议，以帮助这家濒临破产的工作空间提供商摆脱困境，并拒绝了联合创始人亚当-诺伊曼（Adam Neumann）提出的竞争性融资建议。【原文：WeWork Inc. and its major financial backers including SoftBank Group Corp. have struck a new restructuring deal to get the ailing workspace provider out of bankruptcy, spurning a competing financing proposal from co-founder Adam Neumann.】

item.title: 巴西三月份预算赤字出人意料，支出增加
item.description: 巴西 3 月份出现了 15 亿雷亚尔（约合 2.93 亿美元）的基本财政赤字，出乎分析师的意料，他们预测该月将出现盈余，这也加大了政府努力支撑公共账户的压力。【原文：Brazil posted a primary fiscal deficit of 1.5 billion reais ($293 million) in March, surprising analysts who forecast a surplus for the month and ramping up pressure on the government’s efforts to shore up public accounts.】

item.title: 亿万富翁启动欧舒丹收购案，估值 64 亿美元
item.description: 欧舒丹国际有限公司（L'Occitane International SA）的亿万富翁莱诺德-盖格（Reinold Geiger）希望将这家护肤品公司私有化，此举可能会结束其在香港证券交易所长达 14 年的交易。【原文：Reinold Geiger, the billionaire owner of L’Occitane International SA, wants to take the skin-care company private in a move that could end its 14-year run on the Hong Kong stock exchange.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）是 AES 巴西电力部门的竞争者之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，道达尔能源 SE 已成为 AES Corp. 在巴西资产的竞争者之一，与中国三峡集团和总部位于圣保罗的 Auren Energia SA 展开竞争。【原文：TotalEnergies SE has emerged as one of the contenders for the assets of AES Corp. in Brazil, competing against China Three Gorges Corp. and Sao Paulo-based Auren Energia SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 主要保险公司称俄罗斯石油价格上限越来越无法执行
item.description: 全球保险业的一个核心组织表示，七国集团对俄罗斯石油价格设定的上限正变得越来越难以执行，该组织对旨在剥夺克里姆林宫石油美元的措施提出了最直接的批评。【原文：A Group of Seven-imposed cap on the price of Russia oil is becoming increasingly unenforceable, an organization at the heart of the global insurance industry said, offering one of the most direct criticisms yet of measures that were meant to deprive the Kremlin of petrodollars.】

item.title: 津巴布韦将于五月首次公布 ZiG 对通货膨胀的影响
item.description: 津巴布韦统计机构表示，将从 5 月开始根据新货币 ZiG 计算月度通货膨胀数据。【原文：Zimbabwe’s statistics agency said it will start computing monthly inflation data based on its new currency, the ZiG, from May.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金加大科技股购买力度
item.description: 对冲基金对上周科技股的风险上扬势头并不感到失望，他们以一年多来最快的速度抢购该行业的公司。【原文：The risk-on momentum in technology stocks last week wasn’t lost on hedge funds, who scooped up the sector’s companies at the fastest clip in more than a year.】

item.title: 工会称埃克森交易员拒绝迁往伦敦将面临裁员
item.description: 根据埃克森美孚公司工会的一份声明，该公司的一些交易员将失去工作，因为他们不愿意从布鲁塞尔搬到伦敦。【原文：Some traders working for Exxon Mobil Corp. are set to lose their jobs because they don’t want to move from Brussels to London, according to a statement from its unions.】

item.title: 波兰制定财政计划确保债务限额保持不变
item.description: 波兰执政联盟表示，其目标是确保国家避免出现政府债务水平超过欧盟规定上限的情况。【原文：Poland’s ruling coalition said it’s aiming to ensure that the nation avoids a scenario under which the level of government debt breaches a limit imposed by the European Union.】

item.title: 波音公司报告现金消耗后寻求出售债券
item.description: 波音公司正在寻求出售多达六个部分的债券，这是该飞机制造商报告季度亏损和 39 亿美元现金消耗，以及穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将该公司的信用评级下调至垃圾级以上之后的首次债券出售。【原文：Boeing Co. is looking to sell bonds in as many as six parts, its first bond sale after the planemaker reported a quarterly loss and $3.9 billion of cash burn, and Moody’s Ratings cut the company’s credit rating to a step above junk.】

item.title: 邮报》称，印度间谍头目谋杀锡克教活动家的阴谋已被证实
item.description: 华盛顿邮报》援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道说，据称去年在美国本土杀害一名美国公民和锡克教活动家的阴谋得到了印度情报机构高层成员的批准，其中包括当时的情报机构负责人，但该报道没有透露具体身份。【原文：An alleged plot to kill a US citizen and Sikh activist on American soil last year was approved by senior-level members of India’s intelligence agency, including its chief at the time, the Washington Post reported, citing people familiar with the matter it didn’t identify.】
